title: 11 Khwarij killed in 3 separate IBOs in KP
content:
RAWALPINDI, Dec 18 (APP): The Security Forces neutralized 11 Khwarij terrorists in three separate intelligence based operations (IBOs) in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP).
According to a news release issued by Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR), “ An intelligence based operation was conducted by the Security Forces in Tank District on reported presence of Khwarij. During the conduct of operation, own troops effectively engaged the khwarij location, as the result of which seven Khwarij were sent to hell”.
Another intelligence based operation was conducted in general area Datta Khel, North Waziristan District. In ensuing fire exchange, two Khwarij were sent to hell by the security forces, it further said.
In third encounter that took place in general area Mamad Gat, Mohmand District, after an intense fire exchange two Khwarij were sent to hell.
Weapons and ammunition were also recovered from killed khwarij, who remained actively involved in numerous terrorist activities against the security forces as well as innocent civilians, the press release said.
“Sanitization operations are being carried out to eliminate any other Kharji found in the area, as security forces of Pakistan are determined to wipe-out the menace of terrorism from the country,” it further said.
